Ingredients.3: 1 large sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), chopped

Ingredients.8: 2 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard (such as Colman's®)

Ingredients.12: 0.75 teaspoon Greek seasoning (such as Cavender's®), or more to taste

Ingredients.13: 0.5 teaspoon hamburger seasoning (such as McCormick® Grill Mates®), or more to taste

Ingredients.16: 0.5 teaspoon smokehouse maple seasoning (such as McCormick® Grill Mates®), or more to taste

Ingredients.17: 0.25 teaspoon hickory smoked salt (such as McCormick®), or more to taste

Ingredients.18: 2 pinches ground nutmeg, or more to taste

Ingredients.19: 2 cups barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's®)

Directions.1: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir garlic in hot butter until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir onion, green pepper, and cilantro into garlic; cook and stir until the onion is softened, 5 to 10 minutes.

Directions.2: Cook and stir ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat until browned, 5 to 10 minutes; drain fat. Increase heat to medium-high. Stir brown sugar, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, Italian seasoning, onion powder, Greek seasoning, hamburger seasoning, garlic powder, black pepper, smokehouse maple seasoning, smoked salt, and nutmeg into ground beef mixture; cook until boiling, 4 to 6 minutes.

Directions.3: Stir onion mixture into beef mixture; reduce heat to simmer.

Directions.4: Pour barbeque sauce, ketchup, and apple cider vinegar into beef mixture; stir, cover, and simmer until sauce is thickened, 30 minutes. Scoop beef into hamburger buns and serve.
